directions.content: Drag each phrase on the right to its matching phrase on the left (scroll down as needed). Click Submit to check your answers.

questionscommon.content: We're going to go to the movies on Friday night.
I'm going to have a big party!
He's going to go to a club.
Yes, we are. We're going to go to a Mexican restaurant.
No, they are not. It's going to rain.

question.content: Are Victor and Elizabeth going to have a barbeque tonight?
When are you going to go to the movies?
Are you and your mother going to go out for dinner tonight?
What are you going to do for your birthday?
What is your brother going to do tonight?
